entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
